bingeDrinking.description: Respondents who report having 5+ (men) or 4+ (women) drinks on one or more occasions during the previous 30 days. (2005-2011)
bingeDrinking.label: Binge Drinking
bingeDrinking.question: Considering all types of alcoholic beverages, how many times during the past 30 days did you have [5 for men, 4 for women] or more drinks on an occasion?

excessDrinking.description: Respondents who drank >2 (men) or >1 (women) drinks per day on average or who drank 5+ (men) or 4+ (women) drinks during a single occasion. (2005-2011)
excessDrinking.label: Excessive Drinking
excessDrinking.question: One drink is equivalent to a 12-ounce beer, a 5-ounce glass of wine, or a drink with one shot of liquor. During the past 30 days, on the days when you drank, about how many drinks did you drink on the average?

firearmDeaths.description: Violence-related Firearm Death Rates per 100,000 pop. (2004-2010)
firearmDeaths.label: Firearm Deaths
firearmDeaths.sources: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, National Center for Injury Prevention and Control, Statistics, Programming and Economics Branch

noExercise.description: Respondents who report no exercise in past month. (2005-2011)
noExercise.label: No Exercise
noExercise.question: During the past month, other than your regular job, did you participate in any physical activities or exercises such as running, calisthenics, golf, gardening, or walking for exercise?

nonFirearmDeaths.description: Non-Firearm Violence-related Firearm Death Rates per 100,000 pop. (2004-2010)
nonFirearmDeaths.label: Non-Firearm Deaths
nonFirearmDeaths.sources: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, National Center for Injury Prevention and Control, Statistics, Programming and Economics Branch

obesity.description: Respondents aged 18+ years who have a body mass index (BMI) >=30.0 kg/m<sup>2</sup> calculated from self-reported weight and height. (2005-2011)
obesity.label: Obesity
obesity.question: About how much do you weigh without shoes? (and) About how tall are you without shoes?

phyisicianUseDelay.description: Respondents who needed to see a doctor but could not because of cost in the past 12 months. (2005-2011)
phyisicianUseDelay.label: Delay Seeing a Doctor
phyisicianUseDelay.question: Was there a time in the past 12 months when you needed to see a doctor but could not because of cost?

poorHealth.description: Respondents with self-reported fair or poor health status. (2005-2011)
poorHealth.label: Fair or Poor Health
poorHealth.question: Would you say that in general your health is: Excellent, Very good, Good, Fair, Or Poor?

smoking.description: Respondents who report smoking cigarettes all or some days. (2005-2011)
smoking.label: Smoking
smoking.question: Do you now smoke cigarettes every day, some days, or not at all?

socEmoSupport.description: Respondents who report inadequate emotional support. (2005-2011)
socEmoSupport.label: Social-Emotional Support Lacking
socEmoSupport.question: Social-Emotional Support Lacking

totAvg.description: Data derived from collecting all of the non-undefined risk factor indices, and creating an "average" index of basic societal attitudes towards risk factors and preventative mortality risks.
totAvg.label: Mortality Attitude Index
totAvg.question: A high number indicates a low value of life, a low number indicates a high value.
